titles: Torringtonia, or, A new copy of verses on the late sea engagement To a tune, Which no-body can deny.
publisher: Printed at the request of a Tarr. For the diversion of the melancholly widows of Wapping,
notes: Verse - "I sing not the battle (so fam'd) of Lepanto,".
On the sea battle off Beachy Head on 30 June 1690, for which Arthur, Earl of Torrington was censured.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
keywords: Torrington, Arthur Herbert, --  Earl of, 1647-1716 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
